name: sha3sum and then some
short_description: Hash mode interface to the Keccak code package. This program illustrates the use of the Keccak permutation. Usage is much more than a hash function. The NIST compatible settings are subject to change when they publish FIPS PUB 180-5. I wrote this program when evaluating the permutation and developing tree hashing for the Intel(R) MIC architecture.
summary: sha3sum - A demonstration of the Keccak permutation.
